title: Trump’s foreign business partners tout his presidency while promoting projects
summary: Several foreign business partners of the Trump Organization attended inauguration-related events, posed for photos with Trump, and referenced their connections to his presidency in promotional materials
description: Several foreign business partners of the Trump Organization attended inauguration-related events, posed for photos with Trump, and referenced their connections to his presidency in promotional materials
